event.description: Jose Tabata grounds out, third baseman Brett Lawrie to first baseman Adam Lind.
Clint Barmes strikes out swinging.
Neil Walker reaches on fielding error by third baseman Brett Lawrie.
Casey McGehee grounds out, third baseman Brett Lawrie to first baseman Adam Lind.
Pitcher Change: Kyle Drabek replaces Brett Cecil.
Yamaico Navarro reaches on throwing error by shortstop Yunel Escobar.
Nate McLouth walks. Yamaico Navarro to 2nd.
Jake Fox grounds into double play, third baseman Brett Lawrie to first baseman Adam Lind. Yamaico Navarro out at 3rd. Nate McLouth to 2nd.
Gorkys Hernandez called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Jim Hoey replaces Kyle Drabek.
Michael McKenry strikes out swinging.
Jose Tabata grounds out, shortstop Yunel Escobar to first baseman Adam Lind.
Clint Barmes lines out to left fielder Eric Thames.
Pitcher Change: Scott Richmond replaces Jim Hoey.
Neil Walker lines out to first baseman Adam Lind.
Casey McGehee grounds out, shortstop Yunel Escobar to first baseman Adam Lind.
Yamaico Navarro flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Pitcher Change: Danny Farquhar replaces Scott Richmond.
Nate McLouth hit by pitch.
Jake Fox grounds into double play, third baseman Brett Lawrie to second baseman Kelly Johnson to first baseman Adam Lind. Nate McLouth out at 2nd.
Gorkys Hernandez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Jose Bautista.
With Michael McKenry batting, Gorkys Hernandez steals (1) 2nd base.
Michael McKenry singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Jose Bautista. Gorkys Hernandez scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Brandon Boggs replaces Jose Tabata.
Brandon Boggs flies out to center fielder Colby Rasmus.
Defensive Substitution: Omar Vizquel replaces shortstop Yunel Escobar, batting 1st, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Mike McCoy replaces second baseman Kelly Johnson, batting 2nd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Yan Gomes replaces catcher J. P. Arencibia, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Ryan Tepera replaces Danny Farquhar.
Josh Harrison hit by pitch.
Anderson Hernandez flies out to left fielder Eric Thames.
Nick Evans strikes out swinging. Josh Harrison steals (1) 2nd base.
With Jeremy Farrell batting, wild pitch by Ryan Tepera, Josh Harrison to 3rd.
Jeremy Farrell walks.
Starling Marte flies out to right fielder Jose Bautista.
Moises Sierra remains in the game as the right fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Mike McDade replaces first baseman Adam Lind, batting 4th, playing first base.
Ben Francisco remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Jonathan Diaz remains in the game as the third baseman.
Defensive Substitution: Travis Snider replaces left fielder Eric Thames, batting 8th, playing left field.
Pitcher Change: Jerry Gil replaces Ryan Tepera.
Defensive Substitution: Anthony Gose replaces center fielder Colby Rasmus, batting 6th, playing center field.
Jake Fox strikes out swinging.
Robbie Grossman grounds out, second baseman Mike McCoy to first baseman Mike McDade.
Eric Fryer grounds out, third baseman Jonathan Diaz to first baseman Mike McDade.
Pitcher Change: Luis Perez replaces Jerry Gil.
Brandon Boggs grounds out, third baseman Jonathan Diaz to first baseman Mike McDade.
Josh Harrison walks.
Anderson Hernandez grounds into a force out, second baseman Mike McCoy to shortstop Omar Vizquel. Josh Harrison out at 2nd. Anderson Hernandez to 1st.
With Nick Evans batting, wild pitch by Luis Perez, Anderson Hernandez to 2nd.
Nick Evans strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Joel Carreno replaces Luis Perez.
Jeremy Farrell strikes out swinging.
Starling Marte doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Travis Snider.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Matt Hague replaces Jake Fox.
Matt Hague flies out to center fielder Anthony Gose.
Robbie Grossman grounds out, third baseman Jonathan Diaz to first baseman Mike McDade.
Yunel Escobar grounds out, shortstop Clint Barmes to first baseman Casey McGehee.
Kelly Johnson grounds out, second baseman Neil Walker to first baseman Casey McGehee.
Jose Bautista strikes out swinging.
Adam Lind walks.
Edwin Encarnacion singles on a line drive to left fielder Gorkys Hernandez. Adam Lind to 2nd.
Colby Rasmus grounds out, first baseman Casey McGehee to pitcher James McDonald. Adam Lind to 3rd. Edwin Encarnacion to 2nd.
Brett Lawrie doubles (1) on a line drive to left fielder Gorkys Hernandez. Adam Lind scores. Edwin Encarnacion scores.
Eric Thames flies out to center fielder Nate McLouth.
With J. P. Arencibia batting, Brett Lawrie steals (1) 3rd base.
J. P. Arencibia flies out to center fielder Nate McLouth.
Pitcher Change: Brad Lincoln replaces James McDonald.
Yunel Escobar lines out to left fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
Kelly Johnson flies out to left fielder Gorkys Hernandez.
Jose Bautista strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Chris Resop replaces Brad Lincoln.
Adam Lind lines out to second baseman Neil Walker.
Edwin Encarnacion lines out to center fielder Nate McLouth.
Colby Rasmus walks.
Brett Lawrie flies out to right fielder Jose Tabata.
Brandon Boggs remains in the game as the right fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Josh Harrison replaces shortstop Clint Barmes, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Anderson Hernandez replaces second baseman Neil Walker, batting 3rd, playing second base.
Defensive Substitution: Nick Evans replaces first baseman Casey McGehee, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Jeremy Farrell replaces third baseman Yamaico Navarro, batting 5th, playing third base.
Defensive Substitution: Starling Marte replaces center fielder Nate McLouth, batting 6th, playing center field.
Defensive Substitution: Robbie Grossman replaces left fielder Gorkys Hernandez, batting 8th, playing left field.
Defensive Substitution: Eric Fryer replaces catcher Michael McKenry, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Chris Leroux replaces Chris Resop.
Eric Thames homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
J. P. Arencibia strikes out swinging.
Yunel Escobar strikes out swinging.
Kelly Johnson strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Tony Watson replaces Chris Leroux.
Jose Bautista singles on a line drive to center fielder Starling Marte.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Moises Sierra replaces Jose Bautista.
Adam Lind flies out to center fielder Starling Marte.
Edwin Encarnacion hit by pitch. Moises Sierra to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Ben Francisco replaces Edwin Encarnacion.
Colby Rasmus called out on strikes.
Brett Lawrie doubles (2) on a fly ball to center fielder Starling Marte. Moises Sierra scores. Ben Francisco scores.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Jonathan Diaz replaces Brett Lawrie.
Eric Thames singles on a fly ball to left fielder Robbie Grossman. Jonathan Diaz scores.
Yan Gomes singles on a ground ball to left fielder Robbie Grossman. Eric Thames to 2nd.
Omar Vizquel pops out to first baseman Nick Evans.
Pitcher Change: Daniel McCutchen replaces Tony Watson.
Mike McCoy hit by pitch.
Moises Sierra singles on a fly ball to right fielder Brandon Boggs. Mike McCoy to 2nd.
Mike McDade flies out to left fielder Robbie Grossman.
Ben Francisco singles on a line drive to center fielder Starling Marte, deflected by left fielder Robbie Grossman. Mike McCoy scores. Moises Sierra to 3rd.
Anthony Gose strikes out swinging.
Jonathan Diaz grounds out, shortstop Josh Harrison to first baseman Nick Evans.
Pitcher Change: Ryota Igarashi replaces Daniel McCutchen.
Travis Snider grounds out, first baseman Nick Evans to pitcher Ryota Igarashi.
Yan Gomes called out on strikes.
Omar Vizquel strikes out swinging.
